entry.string: We take your right to privacy seriously and want you to feel comfortable using our web site. This Privacy Policy deals with personally identifiable information (referred to as "Data" below) that may be collected by us on our site. This Policy does not apply to other entities that we do not own or control or persons that are not our employees, agents or within our control.
entry.translation: Ve-a teke-a yuoor reeght tu preefecy sereeuoosly und vunt yuoo tu feel cumffurteble-a useeng oooor veb seete-a. Thees Preefecy Puleecy deels veet persunelly identeeffieble-a inffurmeshun (refferred tu es "Deta" beloo) thet mey be-a cullected by us oon oooor seete-a. Thees Puleecy dues nut epply tu oozeer inteeties thet ve-a du nut oovn oor cuntrul oor persuns thet ere-a nut oooor impluyees, egents oor veethin oooor cuntrul.

entry.string: Please take time to read our
entry.translation: Pleese-a teke-a teeme-a tu reed oooor

entry.string: Our registration process requires only a valid e-mail address and a unique user ID and password. Providing us with other information is at your option. Please take note that your user name, e-mail address, or other submissions that you make on this site may contain your real name or other personally identifiable information and, as a result, may appear on this site. Like many web sites, we may also automatically receive general information that is contained in our server log files such as your IP address and cookie information. Information about how advertising may be served on this site (if at all) is set forth below.
entry.translation: Ooor regeestreshun prucess reqooures oonly a feleed i-meeel eddress und a uneeqooe-a user ID und pessvurd. Bork bork bork! Prufeeding us veet oozeer inffurmeshun is et yuoor oopshun. Pleese-a teke-a nute-a thet yuoor user neme-a, i-meeel eddress, oor oozeer soobmeessiuns thet yuoo meke-a oon thees seete-a mey cunteeen yuoor reel neme-a oor oozeer persunelly identeeffieble-a inffurmeshun und, es a resoolt, mey eppeer oon thees seete-a. Leeke-a muny veb seetes, ve-a mey elsu ootumeteecelly receeefe-a generel inffurmeshun thet is cunteeened in oooor serfer lug feeles sooch es yuoor IP eddress und cuukeee-a inffurmeshun. Inffurmeshun ebuoot hoo edferteesing mey be-a serfed oon thees seete-a (iff et ell) is set furt beloo.

entry.string: We may use Data to customize and improve your user experience on this site. We will make efforts so that your Data will not be provided to third parties unless (i) provided for otherwise in this Privacy Policy; (ii) we obtain your consent, such as when you choose to opt-in or opt-out to the sharing of Data; (iii) a service provided on our site requires the interaction with or is provided by a third party, by way of example an Application Service Provider; (iv) pursuant to legal process or law enforcement; (v) we find that your use of this site violates our this Policy, Terms of Service, other usage guidelines or as deemed reasonably necessary by us to protect our legal rights and/or property; (vi) or (vi) this site is purchased by a third party whereby that third party will be able to use the Data in the same manner as we can as set forth in this Policy. In the event you choose to use links that appear on our site to visit other web sites, you are advised to read the privacy policies that appear on those sites.
entry.translation: Ve-a mey use-a Deta tu coostumeeze-a und imprufe-a yuoor user ixpereeence-a oon thees seete-a. Ve-a veell meke-a iffffurts su thet yuoor Deta veell nut be-a prufeeded tu thurd perteees unless (i) prufeeded fur oozeerveese-a in thees Preefecy Puleecy; (iee) ve-a oobteeen yuoor cunsent, sooch es vhee yuoo chuuse-a tu oopt-in oor oopt-oooot tu zee shereeng ooff Deta; (ieei) a serfeece-a prufeeded oon oooor seete-a reqooures zee interecshun veet oor is prufeeded by a thurd perty, by vey ooff ixemple-a un Eppleeceshun Serfeece-a Prufeeder; (if) poorsoount tu legel prucess oor lev inffurcement; (f) ve-a feend thet yuoor use-a ooff thees seete-a feeuletes oooor thees Puleecy, Terms ooff Serfeece-a, oozeer usege-a gooeedelines oor es deemed reesunebly necessery by us tu prutect oooor legel reeghts und/oor pruperty; (fee) oor (fee) thees seete-a is poorchesed by a thurd perty vhereby thet thurd perty veell be-a eble-a tu use-a zee Deta in zee seme-a munner es ve-a cun es set furt in thees Puleecy. Bork bork bork! In zee ifent yuoo chuuse-a tu use-a leenks thet eppeer oon oooor seete-a tu feesit oozeer veb seetes, yuoo ere-a edfeesed tu reed zee preefecy puleecies thet eppeer oon thuse-a seetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Like many web sites, we set and use cookies to enhance your user experience, such as retaining your personal settings. Advertisements may appear on our web site and, if so, may set and access cookies on your computer and is subject to the privacy policy of those parties providing the advertisement. However, the companies serving the advertising do not have access to our cookies. These companies usually use non-personally identifiable or anonymous codes to obtain information about your visits to our site.
entry.translation: Leeke-a muny veb seetes, ve-a set und use-a cuukeees tu inhunce-a yuoor user ixpereeence-a, sooch es reteeening yuoor persunel setteengs. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Edferteesements mey eppeer oon oooor veb seete-a und, iff su, mey set und eccess cuukeees oon yuoor cumpooter und is soobject tu zee preefecy puleecy ooff thuse-a perteees prufeeding zee edferteesement. Um de hur de hur de hur. Hooefer, zee cumpuneees serfeeng zee edferteesing du nut hefe-a eccess tu oooor cuukeees. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Zeese-a cumpuneees usooelly use-a nun-persunelly identeeffieble-a oor ununymuoos cudes tu oobteeen inffurmeshun ebuoot yuoor feesits tu oooor seete-a.

entry.string: to find out more information about your options including from the following companies that may serve advertising on our site:
entry.translation: tu feend oooot mure-a inffurmeshun ebuoot yuoor oopshuns incloodeeng frum zee fullooeeng cumpuneees thet mey serfe-a edferteesing oon oooor seete-a:
EssuceeetePrugrems. Um gesh dee bork, bork!cum

entry.string: We do not allow persons who are aged
entry.translation: Ve-a du nut elloo persuns vhu ere-a eged

entry.string: or younger to become members of this site. For more information, please contact
entry.translation: or yuoonger tu becume-a meemburs ooff thees seete-a. Fur mure-a inffurmeshun, pleese-a cuntect

entry.string: Editing or Deleting Your Account Information
entry.translation: Edeeting oor Deleteeng Yuoor Eccuoont Inffurmeshun

entry.string: We provide you with the ability to edit the information in your user account information that you provided to us in registration by using
entry.translation: Ve-a prufeede-a yuoo veet zee ebeelity tu ideet zee inffurmeshun in yuoor user eccuoont inffurmeshun thet yuoo prufeeded tu us in regeestreshun by useeng

entry.string: You may request deletion of your user account by contacting
entry.translation: Yuoo mey reqooest deleshun ooff yuoor user eccuoont by cuntecteeng

entry.string: Content or other data that you may have provided to us and that is not contained within your user account, such as posts that may appear within our forums, may continue to remain on our site at our discretion even though your user account is deleted.
entry.translation: Cuntent oor oozeer deta thet yuoo mey hefe-a prufeeded tu us und thet is nut cunteeened veethin yuoor user eccuoont, sooch es pusts thet mey eppeer veethin oooor furooms, mey cunteenooe-a tu remeeen oon oooor seete-a et oooor deescreshun ifee thuoogh yuoor user eccuoont is deleted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: We may make changes to this Policy from time to time. We will notify you of substantial changes to this Policy either by posting a prominent announcement on our site and/or by sending a message to the e-mail address you have provided to us that is contained within your user settings.
entry.translation: Ve-a mey meke-a chunges tu thees Puleecy frum teeme-a tu teeme-a. Ve-a veell nuteeffy yuoo ooff soobstunteeel chunges tu thees Puleecy ieezeer by pusteeng a prumeenent unnuooncement oon oooor seete-a und/oor by sendeeng a messege-a tu zee i-meeel eddress yuoo hefe-a prufeeded tu us thet is cunteeened veethin yuoor user setteengs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: While this Privacy Policy states our standards for maintenance of Data and we will make efforts to meet them, we are not in a position to guarantee these standards. There may be factors beyond our control that may result in disclosure of data. As a consequence, we disclaim any warranties or representations relating to maintenance or nondisclosure of Data.
entry.translation: Vheele-a thees Preefecy Puleecy stetes oooor stunderds fur meeentenunce-a ooff Deta und ve-a veell meke-a iffffurts tu meet zeem, ve-a ere-a nut in a puseeshun tu gooeruntee-a zeese-a stunderds. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Zeere-a mey be-a fecturs beyund oooor cuntrul thet mey resoolt in deesclusoore-a ooff deta. Es a cunseqooence-a, ve-a deescleim uny verrunteees oor representeshuns releteeng tu meeentenunce-a oor nundeesclusoore-a ooff Deta.

entry.string: If you have any questions about this Policy or our web site, please feel free to contact
entry.translation: Iff yuoo hefe-a uny qooesshuns ebuoot thees Puleecy oor oooor veb seete-a, pleese-a feel free-a tu cuntect
